About This Site & Disclaimer

Hey, I'm MOMO, and this is my private little theater—Fanhao Diary♡
Don't take this site too seriously. It's just my secret lair for jotting down wild thoughts and cheeky daydreams whenever I watch something spicy.
If you like my vibe, hit that favorite button! Feel free to peek in every day, but be gentle if you leave a comment, or I might have to hide under my blanket (giggle).
[Disclaimer]
Everything here is just for fun and pure self-indulgence—absolutely unrelated to real life! This is for unwinding, giggling, and letting your imagination run wild. No entry for minors, or I'll seriously cry!
If you spot something weird, just let me know quietly. This is my dreamy little zone, so play nice and let's keep it cozy!
